items.title: Italian citizenship referendum polarises country
items.description: People are voting on whether to cut from 10 to five years the time required to apply for citizenship.

items.title: Bowen: Israel is accused of the gravest war crimes - how governments respond could haunt them for years
items.description: Distinguished lawyers, senior humanitarians and diplomats tell Jeremy Bowen why they are increasingly concerned about the catastrophe inside Gaza

items.title: Trump orders National Guard to LA after clashes
items.description: The city sees a second day of clashes over raids by federal agents on undocumented migrants.

items.title: Colombia presidential hopeful shot in head at rally
items.description: The opposition senator was hit three times during rally in Bogota and is in a critical condition in hospital.

items.title: An ancient writing system confounding myths about Africa
items.description: How social media is pushing back against the still common idea that African societies never had a knowledge system.
